thread.title: Steve Martin gets serious as curator of artist Lawren Harris
thread.title_full: Steve Martin gets serious as curator of artist Lawren Harris

title: Steve Martin gets serious as curator of artist Lawren Harris
text: > Top News Steve Martin gets serious as curator of artist Lawren Harris In this Wed., Oct. 7, 2015, photo, Steve Martin, second from left, conducts an exhibition walk through along with co-curators, Andrew Hunter, left, Cynthia Burlingham, center, and Ann Philbin, Director of The Hammer Museum, for the exhibition "The Idea of North: The Paintings of Lawren Harris," at The Hammer Museum in in Los Angeles. The show opens Sunday, Oct. 11, 2015. (Photo by Casey Curry/Invision/AP)
